___force.description: When true, forces overwriting of existing files.

___dryRun.description: When true, runs through and reports activity without writing out results.

___interactive.description: When false, disables interactive input prompts.

___defaults.description: When true, disables interactive input prompts for options with a default.

___help.description: Shows a help message for this command in the console.
